reviewText: Great addition to our Nursery at our church

I expected hand play to the songs so that the children can learn it and use it.  While there is hand play, it doesn't focus on it.  The camera moves around a lot (artistically) and doesn't focus on the on the hand play.  Too distracting.
My children love it!!!!!  A great way to help children to memorize scriptures!!!! Even my 2 year old son loves it!!!!
